Key Arguments: The legislation is an attack on freedom of speech, a fundamental right.
The bill benefits politicians, not citizens, and is a means for the government to gain control.
The government cannot objectively determine truth from falsehood given the vast amount of information available.
The bill could cause harm by censoring information that may later be proven true, as illustrated by the COVID-19 lab origin theory.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of speech is a fundamental right of every Australian.
The government is attempting to place upon itself an impossible burden of objectivity.
What was once called 'misinformation' is now quite possibly the truth!
